page.title: 13FARMING
page.content: {FARMING IN AND AROUND BALCOMBE { (crops) There are ten farms around Balcombe: {Kemps,Bowders,Jarretts,Allens,Yew Tree {,Northlands,Washland,Great Coopers {Corner,Brantridge,West Up.}Most of the land around here is owned by Balcombe Estate (Mr. and Mrs. Greenwood).The land around here is very good for growing crops.The farmers grow all kinds of things like:beetroot,sugar beet,grass,corn and wheat.They grow grass for the cows to eat.There are plenty of cows around here.In winter the cows are put into pens and fed sileage.Sileage is the top layer of grass that is taken from the fields in spring and left in a heap at the farm.The sheep are put out in the fields in winter and sheared in summer.The fields are harvested in summer also.
